Attacks.Name: Psycho Cut
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, this character gains power equal to the damage dealt. If a wild is rolled, the target character is Staggered.

Attacks.Name: Telekinesis
Attacks.Effect: Choose an enemy character within range and line of sight. That character is lifted and placed within range 2 of its current position. This attack does not deal damage.

Attacks.Name: Psychic
Attacks.Effect: This attack causes the target character to gain the Confused special condition. If a wild is rolled, also apply the Stun special condition.

Superpowers.Name: Master Teleporter
Superpowers.Effect: Place this character within range 4 of its current position. This superpower can be used only once per turn.

Superpowers.Name: Mind Barrier
Superpowers.Effect: Add 3 dice to Alakazam's defense rolls until the start of its next activation.

Attacks.Name: Future Sight
Attacks.Effect: This attack predicts the target character's next move. If this attack deals damage, reduce the target character's next attack strength by 2.

Superpowers.Name: Zen Headbutt
Superpowers.Effect: Make an immediate attack with a strength of 6. If this attack deals damage, the target character is knocked down. This superpower can be used only once per turn.
